name: DJ Offer Follow-up Reminders
description: Reminds DJ to follow up on Offer Extended leads at Day 3, 7, 14, 21, and 30 with stage-appropriate prompts.

flow.note: Calculate days since offer was extended

mapper.text:
üìû *Day 3 Follow-up Due*

*{{2.name}}* - Offer extended {{3.days_since_offer}} days ago

*Suggested approach:*
Quick check-in call to surface any questions or objections.

*Questions to ask:*
‚Ä¢ "Have you had a chance to look over the details?"
‚Ä¢ "Any questions I can answer?"
‚Ä¢ "What's your timeline looking like?"

*Their context:*
‚Ä¢ Timeline: {{2.column_values.timeline.text}}
‚Ä¢ Objections noted: {{if(2.column_values.objections.text; 2.column_values.objections.text; 'None recorded')}}

<https://kalerealty.monday.com/boards/18390370563/pulses/{{2.id}}|Open in Monday>

‚úÖ Check *Day 3 Follow-up Done* after contact

üìß *Day 7 Follow-up Due*

*{{2.name}}* - Offer extended {{3.days_since_offer}} days ago

*Suggested approach:*
Add value, don't just "check in."

*Ideas:*
‚Ä¢ Share a relevant market insight or article
‚Ä¢ Invite to upcoming training/event
‚Ä¢ Offer to connect them with a current Kale agent for reference
‚Ä¢ Send something personalized based on their goals: {{if(2.column_values.business_goals.text; 2.column_values.business_goals.text; 'Not recorded')}}

<https://kalerealty.monday.com/boards/18390370563/pulses/{{2.id}}|Open in Monday>

‚úÖ Check *Day 7 Follow-up Done* after contact

üéØ *Day 14 Follow-up Due - Decision Time*

*{{2.name}}* - Offer extended {{3.days_since_offer}} days ago

*Suggested approach:*
Direct but warm. Time to understand where they're at.

*Questions to ask:*
‚Ä¢ "I want to respect your time - where are you at in your thinking?"
‚Ä¢ "Is there something holding you back I can help address?"
‚Ä¢ "Would it help to chat with [agent who recently joined]?"

*Watch for:*
‚ö†Ô∏è If they're not responding, they may be:
- Going with a competitor
- Not actually ready to move
- Ghosting to avoid saying no

<https://kalerealty.monday.com/boards/18390370563/pulses/{{2.id}}|Open in Monday>

‚úÖ Check *Day 14 Follow-up Done* after contact

‚è∞ *Day 21 Follow-up Due - Create Urgency*

*{{2.name}}* - Offer extended {{3.days_since_offer}} days ago

*Suggested approach:*
Create urgency without pressure.

*Ideas:*
‚Ä¢ Reference upcoming event they'd benefit from
‚Ä¢ Mention onboarding timing ("If you're thinking Q1, we'd want to start paperwork by X")
‚Ä¢ Address specific objection from notes: {{if(2.column_values.objections.text; 2.column_values.objections.text; 'None recorded')}}

*Or consider:*
‚Ä¢ Move to *Nurture (Post-Meeting)* if they need more relationship building
‚Ä¢ Move to *Hibernation* if timing isn't right

<https://kalerealty.monday.com/boards/18390370563/pulses/{{2.id}}|Open in Monday>

‚úÖ Check *Day 21 Follow-up Done* after contact

üö® *OFFER OPEN 30+ DAYS - Decision Required*

*{{2.name}}* - Offer extended {{3.days_since_offer}} days ago

*This offer is going stale. Time to decide:*

*Option 1: One more direct ask*
"I sense the timing might not be right. Want me to check back in 90 days?"

*Option 2: Move to Nurture*
Hand back to Ana for long-term relationship building

*Option 3: Move to Hibernation*
Pause for 90 days, revisit later

*Option 4: Mark Lost*
If they've clearly gone elsewhere or aren't a fit

<https://kalerealty.monday.com/boards/18390370563/pulses/{{2.id}}|Open in Monday>

‚ö†Ô∏è Don't let this linger - make a call today!

setup_instructions.step_4: Verify column IDs for offer_date, day_X_followup_done checkboxes
setup_instructions.step_5: Test with a lead in Offer Extended with Offer Date = 4 days ago

followup_philosophy.day_7: Add value, don't just check in
followup_philosophy.day_30: Decision time - close, nurture, or hibernate

notes: Each stage requires previous stage to be complete (prevents skipping)
Day 30+ triggers every day until resolved
DJ manually checks boxes to confirm follow-up done
System doesn't auto-advance - DJ has control
